articles.title: Decoy Article 1
articles.content: This page exists but is not part of the linked list navigation. Accessing pages numerically will lead to incorrect data.

articles.title: Decoy Article 2
articles.content: Following the nextPage metadata is the correct way to navigate through the articles.

articles.title: Decoy Article 3
articles.content: This demonstrates why you should always use the pagination metadata rather than assuming sequential page numbers.

articles.title: Decoy Article 4
articles.content: The actual navigation path is: page-1 -> page-2 -> page-3 -> page-5 -> page-6

articles.title: Decoy Article 5
articles.content: This page (page-4) is orphaned - it exists but is not linked in the navigation chain. Following nextPage links will skip from page-3 directly to page-5.
